duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and coordinate all activities related to the sales compensation cycle including planning, administration, budgeting/forecasting, reporting, and analysis.
Maintain and update the SAP Callidus platform for plans, quotas, and organizational changes.
Collaborate with external consultants on system design updates, testing, and deployment.
Establish actionable metrics and dashboards to showcase the compensation plan effectiveness.
Present insightful summaries to senior management highlighting key opportunities and areas of concern.
Develop models and analysis to support initiatives driving top-line growth and increase employee engagement and retention.
Participate in cross-functional teams to evaluate business processes and develop strategies for operational excellence.
Provide analytical support on ad hoc projects and data requests working with various internal stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: B.S/M.S. in Finance, Mathematics, MIS, Organizational Management, or similar disciplines
Experience in a Telecommunications or SaaS Company is a plus
Proficient with Visualization tools like Tableau and Microsoft BI is a plus
Experience with SQL and data mining tools is a plus
